body: Order Fulfilment Analyst (Rotational Day/Night Shift Pattern)-LOG001595To assist in transferring the warehouse stock in a timely manner, in order to fulfil customer and shipment orders and to help identify any potential stock issues.WHAT WILL I BE DOING?Act decisively and engage effectively with all key stakeholdersCo-ordinate with Transport and Supply Planners to manage the stock into the warehouse (i.e. missing/late replenishment) Co-ordinate with shuttle providers to ensure “backloads” are moved in a timely manner Work with Customer Services to manage any stock issues/shortages etc.Liaise with stock control/integrity on stock discrepanciesConduct inventory allocation to ensure inventory is assigned to correct orders.Manage the BOP processEnsure stock is deployed correctly between local warehouses and is available and ready to ship for all customer ordersCreate deliveries for Sales orders and STOsMonitor Best Before End dates, aged stock profiles and Promotion allocationsMonitor and chase Quality release as required to fulfill ordersWHAT DO I NEED TO DEMONSTRATE? Required Education and Experience:Bachelor Degree or equivalent, preferably in Management, Business, Supply Chain, Accounting or related fieldLanguage skills- English (Required); Second Language (Preferred)Strong analytical and problem solving skills and a high level of proficiency in MS ExcelUnderstanding of inventory policies and inventory management Proficiency with ERP systems (e.g. SAP) and Microsoft OfficePreferred Criteria:Experience of working for a multinational organization and working with colleagues internationallyFMCG industry work experienceCompetencies:Acts Decisively and engages effectively with key stakeholders in a proactive mannerWHAT ELSE DO I NEED TO KNOW?
